content: 150 cm for the mattress stitch 2 embroidery once you have done knitting you can start embroidering first you need to transfer the motif to the embroidery backing place it to the bottom pattern 1 and top pattern 2 of the knitted headband on the right side you can see how to embroider in the video here https //www youtube com/watch v=kshxbifn51i dissolve the backing in water best with using running water over the fabric block your work pattern 1 3 pattern 2 assembly seam two opposite sides together using mattress stitch https //www youtube com/watch v=46iuyefckxa seam the bottom cast on edge as well as the top bind off edge with embroidered side facing you assemble the headband as shown in following photos 4 thank you for knitting my design do not forget to use #floralheadband and tag me @heklarije_i_to on social media i would love to see your versions please be aware this pattern is not tested a big thank you to tea @shokomokosh and marija korać @macakorac for tech edit assistance for any questions please e-mail heklarije i to@gmail com 5
